title: Actually muting every single players in my team from now on.

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body:
Im actually about to stop playing the game because of all those sexist comments, it makes me want to throw up. It happens about every single game and it feels like those player never have any consequences because theres just many of them.


https://gyazo.com/98fbe64526c111800f08b53f8b311659
https://gyazo.com/9c806e02c26539d476dc12c82029fe8c
https://gyazo.com/8dd417d34a0949d18ab9468590c446f7
https://gyazo.com/7f58c49c4dd18b01314525dab6624de2

replies.body: Just curious - how do they know you’re a girl? I wouldn’t get that from your name . . .
People assume when you main enchanters.
Idk. I used to play only Soraka, and I never once got that.

Really? About 1/10-20 games I get a comment about it from the enemy if i'm doing well, teammate if i'm doing poorly, or anyone if I say anything in all chat. Generally things like "go back to the kitchen"

i googled her name ....
kastumi is .....
an Adult movie star...

> [{quoted}](name=stopthesinged,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-05-24T12:20:51.086+0000)
>
> Just curious - how do they know you’re a girl? I wouldn’t get that from your name . . .

Why would it make a difference whether there is or isn't a girl in game?  There is this weird thing among boys/men that, its ok to be sexist, as long as no girls are around.

> [{quoted}](name=LordBadToo,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2019-05-29T11:32:37.880+0000)
>
> Why would it make a difference whether there is or isn't a girl in game?  There is this weird thing among boys/men that, its ok to be sexist, as long as no girls are around.

The irony in the fact that you just made a sexist comment against men while trying to put down being sexist.

OP:  [A few words that they used are in the filters, so might get lucky.](https://pastebin.com/WJcft46x)
That being said, a lot of it is also contextual euphemisms(?), so really hope they do that a lot so that they are flagged for manual review asap : X

Sorry that you have to go through that kind of BS constantly, remember that you can type "/mute all" at any time, and maybe manually unmute a few of the people who were nicer at the beginning when you are recalling or dead.

pursuablelubuable:  Probably saw a cute name, stereotyped enchanters as the easiest sub-class in the easiest role (popular with femoids bcuz they bad at vidya), and then just took it from there.
A lot of incels play this game

> [{quoted}](name=Quiet Dude,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-05-24T12:34:14.204+0000)
>
> A lot of incels play this game

You're right bud, and thats the sad part.

So its ok to call players "incels" But the moment someone gets called an "egirl" you shed a tear and call it a tragedy, Hypocrite much?

Oh wait, no. always gotta have the double standards to protect the wahmenz.
Because incels are real? and incels are guys that are really delusional and toxic? Also it wasn't because she was called an e-girl. Those guys were disgusting in chat.

Egirl = an Often degrading label directed at females = NEVER Allowed!

Incel = An often degrading label directed at Men = A-OK, cuz men. 

Both are real, But one is perfectly acceptable to label men while the other is never allowed because it might hurt wahmens feels. 

My point stands.
Double standards permeate this rapidly decaying society, my dude.

No you have no point. 

This post is not about the term E-girl. And E-girl is not offensive and is not a thing. It's a label, not an actual group like incels. You really can't be that dense.  There is literally a reddit group of Incels who believe woman owe them sex. 

the post is about the sexual harassment that does not include the term E-girl. Not hard  to understand. Unless you have dyslexia, not hard to read the text in the screenshots. I'm starting to think you are one of them because you are clearly deflecting sexual harassment with the term E-girl. And somehow are offended that an Incel is actual thing.
amen

I've played several thousand games and don't recall seeing this kind of behavior even a single time. Chat is usually dead silent, with the occasional "gj" or "we lose" or whatever. Half-hearted arguments are moderately common, but this level of banworthy behavior is an absolute rarity in my experience - especially with this such a focus. Perhaps the frequency with which you're seeing it is largely due to the familiarity factor you mention, with people at such a high MMR actually playing together multiple times and getting to know each other.
See I never get those comments, weird given my name

Exactly this. People seem even more sexist recently. Had one game I made the mistake of saying my friend will be right back when she disconnected and like the idiot I am, I said 'She'll' and then the Draven kept on calling her an egirl and ehunnie etc whatever he can think about and complain in all chat about having an 'egirl' as his support. Worst thing is when the rest of your team says nothing or joins in. More recently I myself experienced sexist comments just because I was playing Yuumi. I didn't even say a single thing that Yuumi game. People are dumb. I feel like punishments towards sexist comments should be harsher than just a chat restriction to get across the message its not okay to do.
Just report and move on. And maybe try to friend and play with ppl who you see are nice. It makes the gameplay much easier to have a pal who you know won't flame or harass you.

> [{quoted}](name=ZaFishbone,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-05-24T08:12:50.672+0000)
>
> Just report and move on. And maybe try to friend and play with ppl who you see are nice. It makes the gameplay much easier to have a pal who you know won't flame or harass you.

That's a ranked game. I don't like norms since im d2 and im always matched with plats.

> [{quoted}](name=Katsumi41,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-05-24T20:59:26.145+0000)
>
> That's a ranked game. I don't like norms since im d2 and im always matched with plats.

You can still duo with a friend in ranked.

tbf whether they discerned/guessed your sex or not, they'd be dicks either way for the exact same reason, because they can. The only alteration they make is the kind of trash they spew.
Say something that even slightly resembles something group X would say, and you see similar adjustments in the kinds of insults they toss. Such is the nature of a petty, worthless brat... all they can do is attack the superficial, like a politician they can't stand on their own 2 feet, and instead have to stamp on the toes of others.

While one shouldn't have to. /mute all, disable/hide the chat ect. Not sure how long you've been playing, but if not for long you get used to it.

In the end, they're microscopic specs, living in an insignificant city/town, on a teeny tiny planet in an irrelevant galaxy. Why even gratify something so pointless with a response? Is it really worth your time and energy?

Well, a few games ago I've been flamed by a couple enemies because I dared to write (as I always do at the start of a game) in the global chat "Good luck and have fun, guys".
Anyway, those guys are utterly disgusting. I've never seen something like that happening on the European server, seems like America has a major issue with the concept of respecting women.

> [{quoted}](name=Power Mac,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-24T07:57:17.560+0000)
>
> Well, a few games ago I've been flamed by a couple enemies because I dared to write (as I always do at the start of a game) in the global chat "Good luck and have fun, guys".
> Anyway, those guys are utterly disgusting. I've never seen something like that happening on the European server, seems like America has a major issue with the concept of respecting women.

Because  like 3 guys did it that means the entire NA server has a major issue huh?

> [{quoted}](name=Light Burner,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2019-05-29T12:48:55.857+0000)
>
> Because  like 3 guys did it that means the entire NA server has a major issue huh?

Read carefully, I wrote "America", meaning its inhabitants as a whole. Every time I read comments about any social issue, if the audience is American most of the comments (I'm referring to YouTube and Facebook, mainly) either rant about feminism or alleged SJWs, or keep the flame beyond any acceptable level. Something that isn't unheard of in Europe, but is definitely way, way less frequent. I may be racist, but my image of the average American isn't that nice at all. Concerning LoL, I have an NA account (which I seldom use, to be honest, because of the ping) and while the flaming rate is basically the same as on the EUW server, the contents are quite worse. I won't even mention the people who commented on the posts about Riot employees' protests basically saying that workers should just shut up and work and be grateful, as if they were slaves. That's all.

> [{quoted}](name=Power Mac,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2019-05-29T15:41:55.333+0000)
>
> Read carefully, I wrote "America", meaning its inhabitants as a whole. Every time I read comments about any social issue, if the audience is American most of the comments (I'm referring to YouTube and Facebook, mainly) either rant about feminism or alleged SJWs, or keep the flame beyond any acceptable level. Something that isn't unheard of in Europe, but is definitely way, way less frequent. I may be racist, but my image of the average American isn't that nice at all. Concerning LoL, I have an NA account (which I seldom use, to be honest, because of the ping) and while the flaming rate is basically the same as on the EUW server, the contents are quite worse. I won't even mention the people who commented on the posts about Riot employees' protests basically saying that workers should just shut up and work and be grateful, as if they were slaves. That's all.

So you're entire basis on generalizing to "American inhabitants" is anecdotal evidence? So because everything i witnessed from a specific area did this that means they all do it.

Call them an incel, usually pisses guys like that off

I do wish Riot would crack down harder on stuff like this though. I feel like it should just be a permaban.
Yeah bc people typing stupid shit like that is a permaban... don't be a panzie.

> [{quoted}](name=Carry for Weeks,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-05-29T01:00:40.981+0000)
>
> Yeah bc people typing stupid shit like that is a permaban... don't be a panzie.

panzie? you mean "pansy"?

> [{quoted}](name=Katsumi41,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-05-24T01:18:30.185+0000)
>
> Im actually about to stop playing the game because of all those sexist comments, it makes me want to throw up. It happens about every single game and it feels like those player never have any consequences because theres just many of them.
> 
> 
> https://gyazo.com/98fbe64526c111800f08b53f8b311659
> https://gyazo.com/9c806e02c26539d476dc12c82029fe8c
> https://gyazo.com/8dd417d34a0949d18ab9468590c446f7
> https://gyazo.com/7f58c49c4dd18b01314525dab6624de2

At the risk of getting downvoted into oblivion, here's a piece of advice. Stop telling people you're female. You're quite obviously doing it, and you're doing it often if you're seeing this much sexist nonsense in the chat regularly.

> [{quoted}](name=RobShizzle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2019-05-25T17:59:24.041+0000)
>
> At the risk of getting downvoted into oblivion, here's a piece of advice. Stop telling people you're female. You're quite obviously doing it, and you're doing it often if you're seeing this much sexist nonsense in the chat regularly.

Actually read what i've replied please. I never tell anyone im a female. Even if I do so, does it gives ANYONE the right to insult? The fact that you see someone different doesnt give you the fact to be an a**h***.

> [{quoted}](name=Katsumi41,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2019-05-26T02:00:46.043+0000)
>
> Actually read what i've replied please. I never tell anyone im a female. Even if I do so, does it gives ANYONE the right to insult? The fact that you see someone different doesnt give you the fact to be an a**h***.

Oh no, I read it. I just don't buy it. You are doing something deliberate to clue people in as to your gender. There is no way this would be an issue if you weren't.
I agree. I play about 98% female chars in league and have never once had someone assume I was a female in real life.
Just tell them that kasumi can be a guy's name as well.

I get called a %%%%%%%%%%, idiot, %%%%%%, noob, r%%%%%, dumbass, shit stain, piece of shit every day I play this game at some point, and guess what, I don't give a single fuck. I don't even bother reporting people for that because I simply do not care. You're being overly dramatic OP. Perhaps online games aren't for you if you think demanding we try to change human nature is the way to go.

This is why it pisses me the fuck off when people are like "OHH HURR DURR GIRLS ARE JUST BAD AT LEAGUE." Would you want to sit through all the goddamn harassment all while people are telling you you're not allowed to be upset about it? It's no wonder a lot of female players quit before getting high ELO.
Also wtf is wrong with ppl? report those fuckers. This is why I won't stop having a voice. This also why i report ppl. And everyone needs to work together to turn this trash community arround.
I'm sorry. I can't beleive this exist at D2. how is this possible?

Hey, I won't say don't worry about it, but let me explain to you the idea behind stereotyping people in a condescending way. 

Many people that do this kind of thing feel inferior and weak because they have no argument to stand on. They are mentally unstable, due to various factors, and take the easy road and put others down for aspects of themselves they either cannot change, or should not change. The truth is women can kick my ass in most video games. I'm a guy, but I have seen through experience that male or female shows absolutely no cognitive difference in terms of how we play the game. Guys that do this aren't actually trying to actively insult you to hurt you as their only goal. They need something to step on in their moments of failure because they are weak emotionally.

I'm not making excuses for these people or invalidating how you feel. I just want you to know possible reasons that are not related to you at all may be contributing to your issues. I want you to know that I care and think about how this affects women. And the sad thing is, they're shooting themselves in the foot. I for one would love it if more women played video games, so I could meet them online and maybe become friends and find my partner through an associated network. I can't imagine a world in which these guys would act this way towards women and not expect to be single for a very long time. 

So really, it all amounts to stupidity and immaturity. I am sorry you have to take our immaturity, but know that in the end, you'll come out ahead of them because you don't need to put someone down for something outside of their control to make yourself happy.

> [{quoted}](name=This Is Your Dad,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-05-24T16:34:01.189+0000)
>
> Hey, I won't say don't worry about it, but let me explain to you the idea behind stereotyping people in a condescending way. 
>

They are mentally unstable, due to various factors, and take the easy road and put others down for aspects of themselves they either cannot change, or should not change. The truth is women can kick my ass in most video games. I'm a guy, but I have seen through experience that male or female shows absolutely no cognitive difference in terms of how we play the game. Guys that do this aren't actually trying to actively insult you to hurt you as their only goal. They need something to step on in their moments of failure because they are weak emotionally.
>

I want you to know that I care and think about how this affects women. And the sad thing is, they're shooting themselves in the foot. I for one would love it if more women played video games, so I could meet them online and maybe become friends and find my partner through an associated network. I can't imagine a world in which these guys would act this way towards women and not expect to be single for a very long time. 
> 
> So really, it all amounts to stupidity and immaturity. I am sorry you have to take our immaturity, but know that in the end, you'll come out ahead of them because you don't need to put someone down for something outside of their control to make yourself happy.

I do understand what is it. I really do. My only problem with this is that it is recurent. I never got anyone insulting before getting into d2-d1 games. It's just the fact that it happens all the time that is bothering me. I feel like the do this because they have an ego and thats the problem right there. People have egos but they are so immature and stupid.

Don't talk to people. It's that simple. I don't care about the random shit they say, especially on my team. Just realize there is absolutely nothing they could say that adds to the game. Sure, they can spam :) and "nice play" all they want, but that's not gonna impact me. Odds are much higher that they complain or flame, which WILL influence how I play.

As a solution, since I didn't really give you one, play games unmuted, find some respectable people, add them and then play with them.

Also, ask people from the boards who have similar issues to add you and play with you in game. League should be less about randos and more about community building.
The worst part is that sexism doesn't trigger riots no no word filter, so reporting them does nothing.

> [{quoted}](name=A Girl Supp Main,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-05-24T12:14:08.920+0000)
>
> The worst part is that sexism doesn't trigger riots no no word filter, so reporting them does nothing.

Because the words used arent inherently sexist, so creating an autoban for commonly used words wouldnt work with too many false positives.

Theyd likely be a 14 day manual review.

The fact you let this shit bother you is laughable. Who gives a fuck? mute them and move on. You give these people power by giving them attention. They can't do anything to you. I literally play with my GF all the time and she never gets "sexist" comments ever. You are most likely doing something to incite it.

I'm pretty sure you cause this somehow, announcing you are a girl or whatever...

Some time ago one of my other accs was a main support with (Morgana, Soraka, Lulu) and somehow i was NEVER assumed to be a girl.... Just strange....

> [{quoted}](name=Ph03n1xb1rd,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=OnKMIAXY,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-05-24T20:53:56.139+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure you cause this somehow, announcing you are a girl or whatever...
> 
> Some time ago one of my other accs was a main support with (Morgana, Soraka, Lulu) and somehow i was NEVER assumed to be a girl.... Just strange....

I never told anyone that I was a girl in game. But you know, once you get to pretty high elos, people knows you because you have ''a name''. 

Why would I anyways?
I dont want to be insulted more...
